introduction.title: Safety & Compliance at Biffle
content: At Biffle, user safety is our top priority. We maintain strict compliance with industry standards and implement comprehensive moderation policies to ensure a safe environment for all users. Our commitment to safety extends across every aspect of our platform, from content moderation to user interactions.

safetyMeasures.title: Our Safety Measures
content: We implement multiple layers of protection to keep our community safe:

subsections.title: AI-Powered Content Moderation
content: Advanced artificial intelligence systems that scan content in real-time
Detection of inappropriate, harmful, or prohibited content
Automatic flagging of suspicious activities and behaviors

subsections.title: 24/7 Human Moderation Team
content: Dedicated team of trained moderators available round the clock
Expert review of flagged content and user reports
Swift action on violations and policy breaches

subsections.title: User Verification Systems
content: Multi-factor authentication for enhanced account security
Identity verification processes for creators
Phone number verification for all users

complianceStandards.title: Compliance Standards
content: Biffle adheres to the highest standards of compliance and regulatory requirements:

subsections.title: Indian Legal Framework
content: Full compliance with the Information Technology Act, 2000
Adherence to the Bharatiya Nyaya Sanhita, 2023
Implementation of Consumer Protection Act, 2019 requirements

subsections.title: Data Protection
content: GDPR-compliant data handling practices
Secure storage on AWS and Google Cloud Platform
Encrypted transmission of all sensitive data

subsections.title: Payment Security
content: PCI DSS compliance for payment processing
SSL encryption for all financial transactions
Secure integration with trusted payment gateways

reportingSystem.title: Reporting & Enforcement
content: We provide multiple channels for users to report concerns:

subsections.title: In-App Reporting
content: Easy-to-use reporting tools within the platform
Multiple categories for different types of violations
Anonymous reporting options for sensitive cases

subsections.title: Direct Contact
content: Email support at support@biffle.ai
Dedicated grievance officer for legal matters
24/7 support team for urgent safety concerns

subsections.title: Response Timeline
content: Immediate review of critical safety reports
Response within 24 hours for standard reports
Follow-up communication on resolution status

userGuidelines.title: User Safety Guidelines
content: Help us maintain a safe environment by following these guidelines:

subsections.title: Personal Information
content: Never share personal contact information in public posts
Be cautious about sharing location details
Report any requests for private information

subsections.title: Content Sharing
content: Only share content you have the right to post
Respect copyright and intellectual property rights
Avoid sharing sensitive or private information about others

subsections.title: Interactions
content: Treat all users with respect and kindness
Report any form of harassment or bullying
Be mindful of cultural sensitivities and differences

emergencyProcedures.title: Emergency Procedures
content: In case of immediate safety concerns:

subsections.title: Immediate Actions
content: Block the user immediately if you feel threatened
Take screenshots or recordings of concerning content
Report the incident through our emergency reporting system

subsections.title: Law Enforcement
content: Contact local law enforcement for immediate threats
We cooperate fully with legal authorities
Provide all necessary information to support investigations

subsections.title: Support Resources
content: Access to mental health resources and support
Crisis intervention services for affected users
Community support groups and counseling referrals

creatorSafety.title: Creator Safety
content: Special safety measures for content creators:

subsections.title: Verification Process
content: Comprehensive identity verification for all creators
Background checks for high-profile creators
Regular re-verification to maintain platform integrity

subsections.title: Content Protection
content: Watermarking and digital rights management
Monitoring for unauthorized content distribution
Legal support for copyright infringement cases

subsections.title: Fan Interaction Safety
content: Tools to manage and moderate fan interactions
Ability to block or restrict problematic users
Support for handling overwhelming or inappropriate attention

transparency.title: Transparency & Accountability
content: We believe in transparency about our safety practices:

subsections.title: Regular Reports
content: Quarterly safety reports published publicly
Statistics on content moderation and enforcement actions
Updates on new safety features and improvements

subsections.title: User Feedback
content: Regular surveys on safety and user experience
Open channels for safety suggestions and improvements
Community advisory board for safety policy input

subsections.title: Continuous Improvement
content: Regular review and updates of safety policies
Integration of new technologies for enhanced protection
Partnerships with safety organizations and experts

contactInformation.title: Contact Information
content: For safety-related concerns, contact us:
Emergency Support: Available 24/7 through in-app reporting
General Safety Inquiries: safety@biffle.ai
Legal Matters: legal@biffle.ai
Grievance Officer: grievance@biffle.ai
